description:
LSPosed module that persists Android file picker sort order Persists sort preferences in Android's file picker (DocumentsUI). Manual sort changes are saved and restored across directories and sessions. Defaults to date descending. Requirements
  • LSPosed framework (API 100+)
  • Android 11+ (API 30)
  • Root access
Supported Packages
  • com.google.android.documentsui (Google/Pixel devices)
  • com.android.documentsui (AOSP ROMs)
Installation
  1. Install LSPosed (JingMatrix fork recommended)
  2. Install this module
  3. Enable in LSPosed Manager
  4. Add DocumentsUI package to module scope
  5. Force stop DocumentsUI
Source: https://github.com/hxreborn/remember-my-sort License: GPL-3.0
